thread.section_title: Osiris Tours Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Osiris Tours | osiristours.com
thread.title: Shyam Balaji
thread.title_full: Osiris Tours reviewed by Shyam Balaji

author: Shyam Balaji
title: Shyam Balaji
text:
Mahmoud with Osiris Tours was a very attentive and helpful when it came to planning our 11 day Egypt trip spanning over Cairo, Aswan, Abu Simbel, Luxor, and Cairo complete with a Nile River Cruise. Our itinerary was tailor made and fitted our requirement perfectly. We had knowledgeable, friendly and professional Egyptologist guides the whole way through (Hala Kamel for Giza and Cairo and Mohammed Saad for Aswan and Luxor) who answered all our questions with alacrity. We felt safe and looked after the whole way through.
What was particularly impressive was our guides willingness to go above and beyond. My mum was injured during our trip and our guide sorted out the required hospital and medical care very smoothly. Needless to say, it was difficult to say farewell to the guides we grew so close to.
I would highly recommend booking with Osiris!
